displayName.text: Animal Care Centers of NYC - Manhattan

formattedAddress: 326 E 110th St, New York, NY 10029, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Animal Care Centers of NYC - Manhattan

adrFormatAddress: 326 E 110th St, New York, NY 10029-3002, USA

originalText.text: I sent in my application online for a few dogs at the ACC. Lovely Isabella called me to see what we were looking for in a new family addition.  She hooked us up with the most precious 5 1/2 year old and it feels like she's been here forever. The entire process was so smooth, very mindful of the animals, and I highly recommend you help save a life.  They couldn't make it any easier. Love this foster program. It's great to have an insight into their behavior outside of the shelter. Thank you for all you are doing. You're truly special people.

originalText.text: My experience was excellent the staff was very welcoming and friendly. Everything was organized well and the process was quicker than expected. I came in provided my information looked at some rabbits and was able to take one home the same day. ACC was definitely the best decision I made to getting a new pet.

text.text: My experience was excellent the staff was very welcoming and friendly. Everything was organized well and the process was quicker than expected. I came in provided my information looked at some rabbits and was able to take one home the same day. ACC was definitely the best decision I made to getting a new pet.

originalText.text: Life happens and I was in desperate need of dog food to get through the week. I had no idea that ACC did this until I was already in a situation! My dog has an allergy to wheat, they searched their storage room, text me and provided me with enough dog food to get to payday! I am beyond grateful for them. When God permits I will give back! There were happy people there who were adopting a litter of kittens that came in and other than having some of us wait outside in the rain I am a huge fan!!! I pray everyone adopts! And if you ever need help shoot them an email they are the pet angels on earth! They provided wheat free food for my baby, and some dog toys and some calming treats which my dog LOVES!!! I am so grateful and blessed thank you Lord! God Bless!

originalText.text: We have been in transitional living situations for a year while my rescue pup got worse and Alexander and the Staff were covid conscious and empathetic. Their kindness and professionalism were exactly what I needed. They handled my Lolis with dignity and grace. I will always be incredibly grateful for their help. I got my paw prints in a beautiful card. Adopt. Donate. Volunteer. Thank you to all the staff for your attentive care in the loss of a doggie who rescued meüíñüê∂üêæ
